name: Tycoon's Choice
description:
Tycoon's Choice: My Secretary is a modern RPG simulation mobile game based on an exciting and immersive novel storyline. Recruit all the agents and explore the immersive and amazing dating experience with gorgeous babes, you will be the tycoon of this underworld city.

-Game Features-
*Build and Manage your business
Manage the business in your city as you progress along with the story, recruiting employees and expanding your business, creating the greatest industry in the world.
*Recruit the best agents
Recruit all of the great agents to your team and conquer this underworld city.
*Meet the stunning Babes
Choose from more than 10 gorgeous babes to explore the realistic and immersive dating experience.
*Creating a Guild
Rally your allies and Cruising through the city wars together.
*The Luxury Life Experience
Collect all the luxurious vehicles, all the advanced weapons, and control all the territories of this city. This is where you can encounter all the realistic luxury life experiences.

Download now to be the Tycoon of this city!
